ygData.subject: Re: NEO BEAST WARS
ygData.msgSnippet: Suukie just fired at the base blindly and was hit with autogun fire. Predacons fall to the maximals, Maximals are pals. Suukie blurted out, not even knowing

Suukie just fired at the base blindly and was hit with autogun fire.

"Predacons fall to the maximals, Maximals are pals." Suukie blurted out, not
even knowing wwhat he was talking about. The Poeple's Group ran in and
started to drag him but he shoved them away, being taller than all of them
except for Stronghold. Suukie walked forward, ignoring any injuries and
firing at the Predacons in the name of the Maximals...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 11, 2000 6:51 PM
Subject: Re: NEO BEAST WARS


> Double Punch/Manterror/Injector:
>
> Double Punch, at the scanners, saw gunfire hitting the ship.  Seeing
Suukie
> on a screen he slammed a pincher on the ground.  <Lord Hell Beast, the
> Maximal's "allies" are attacking us.  They've tricked us!  Return
quickly!>
> Pressing a few buttons, all klaxons began to flash red, base defenses came
> online and opened fire on Suukie.  The intercom blared with Double Punch's
> steady voice.  ~All Predacons, this is Double Punch.  For now, I'm in
command
> until someone of higher rank relieves me.  We are under attack by the
> Maximals!  All forces are to take battle stations, and counter assault the
> enemy forces.  So far it just looks like a scouting party, but more are
> obviously on the way!  SO MOVE IT!!!~
>
> (I hope no one minds me doing this, on the Predacon's side that is)
>
> Injector jumped, having been in his quarters.  "Maximals, hehe.  Time for
> them to feel my sting!" he said, taking out his stinger missile launcher,
> heading for a hatch.
>
> -----
>
> Manterror in the engine doing routine check ups, hearing the intercon
slammed
> his foot on the ground.  Pressing a few buttons, he set up a network of
extra
> energy just in case the shields or weapons went down, he then headed for a
> hatch, banging on people's quarters and yelling brief explanations and
> telling them to "Get the slag up!".
>
